commands.name: Configure AWS CLI
commands.description: Opens AWS CLI configuration wizard to set up access keys, region, and output format. Requires AWS CLI to be installed. Install: https://aws.amazon.com/cli/

commands.name: List Buckets AWS S3
commands.description: Lists all S3 buckets in your AWS account. Requires AWS CLI to be installed and configured with valid credentials.

commands.name: List Instances AWS EC2
commands.description: Lists all EC2 instances in your AWS account with detailed information. Requires AWS CLI to be installed and configured.

commands.name: List Functions AWS Lambda
commands.description: Lists all Lambda functions in your AWS account. Requires AWS CLI to be installed and configured.

commands.name: Login Azure CLI
commands.description: Opens Azure CLI login process to authenticate with your Azure account. Requires Azure CLI to be installed. Install: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/cli/azure/install-azure-cli

commands.name: List VMs Azure
commands.description: Lists all virtual machines in your Azure subscription. Requires Azure CLI to be installed and authenticated.

commands.name: List Storage Azure
commands.description: Lists all storage accounts in your Azure subscription. Requires Azure CLI to be installed and authenticated.

commands.name: Configure GCP CLI
commands.description: Opens Google Cloud CLI authentication process. Requires Google Cloud SDK to be installed. Install: https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/install

commands.name: List Instances GCP
commands.description: Lists all compute instances in your Google Cloud project. Requires Google Cloud SDK to be installed and authenticated.

commands.name: List Buckets GCP
commands.description: Lists all Cloud Storage buckets in your Google Cloud project. Requires Google Cloud SDK to be installed and authenticated.

commands.name: Init Terraform
commands.description: Initializes a Terraform working directory and downloads required providers. Requires Terraform to be installed. Install: https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/downloads

commands.name: Plan Terraform
commands.description: Creates an execution plan for Terraform infrastructure changes. Requires Terraform to be installed and initialized.

commands.name: Apply Terraform
commands.description: Applies Terraform infrastructure changes to create or modify resources. Requires Terraform to be installed and a plan to be available.

commands.name: Destroy Terraform
commands.description: Destroys all resources managed by Terraform. Use with caution as this will delete infrastructure. Requires Terraform to be installed.

commands.name: Get Pods Kubernetes
commands.description: Lists all pods across all namespaces in your Kubernetes cluster. Requires kubectl to be installed and configured. Install: https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/tools/

commands.name: Get Services Kubernetes
commands.description: Lists all services across all namespaces in your Kubernetes cluster. Requires kubectl to be installed and configured.

commands.name: Get Nodes Kubernetes
commands.description: Lists all nodes in your Kubernetes cluster. Requires kubectl to be installed and configured.

commands.name: List Images Docker
commands.description: Lists all Docker images available on your system. Requires Docker to be installed. Install: https://docs.docker.com/get-docker/

commands.name: List Containers Docker
commands.description: Lists all Docker containers (running and stopped) on your system. Requires Docker to be installed.

commands.name: Create Repository GitHub
commands.description: Creates a new public GitHub repository using GitHub CLI. Requires GitHub CLI to be installed and authenticated. Install: https://cli.github.com/

commands.name: Create PR GitHub
commands.description: Creates a new pull request on GitHub using GitHub CLI. Requires GitHub CLI to be installed and authenticated.

commands.name: Sync S3 AWS
commands.description: Synchronizes local files with an S3 bucket. Uploads files from local directory to S3. Requires AWS CLI to be installed and configured.

commands.name: Validate Terraform
commands.description: Validates Terraform configuration files for syntax and internal consistency. Requires Terraform to be installed.

commands.name: Run Playbook Ansible
commands.description: Executes an Ansible playbook against specified inventory. Requires Ansible to be installed. Install: https://docs.ansible.com/ansible/latest/installation_guide/intro_installation.html
